com.foreach.across.modules.filemanager.business

Class FileDescriptor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.foreach.across.modules.filemanager.business.FileDescriptor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FileRepositoryResourceDescriptor, Serializable

    public class FileDescriptor
extends Object
implements FileRepositoryResourceDescriptor
    Represents a single FileResource in a specific FileRepository.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • getFolderId

        public String getFolderId()
        Returns:
        Path within the repository this file can be found, null if the file is considered in the root folder.

      • getExtension

        public String getExtension()
        Returns the extension of this file. This is the segment after the last dot in the file id. An extension is not required and empty string will be returned if it is missing.
        Returns:
        extension of this file or empty string if none

      • toString

        public String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class Object

      • withExtensionFrom

        public FileDescriptor withExtensionFrom(String path)
        Clones the current descriptor but modifies the file id by replacing the extension with the extension from the path passed in. If path is null, empty or has no extension, any current extension will be removed instead. If there is no current extension, one will be added.

        Especially useful for modifying generated file descriptors to have the same extension as an original file.

        Parameters:
        path - from which to get the extension
        Returns:
        new descriptor

      • withExtension

        public FileDescriptor withExtension(String extension)
        Clones the current descriptor but modifies the file id by replacing the extension with the extension passed in. If the new extension is null or empty, any current extension will be removed instead. If there is no current extension, one will be added.

        Especially useful for modifying generated file descriptors to have the same extension as an original file.

        Parameters:
        extension - to apply to the file id
        Returns:
        new descriptor

      • withSuffix

        public FileDescriptor withSuffix(String suffix)
        Clones the current descriptor but applies a suffix to the file id.
        Parameters:
        suffix - to append to the file id
        Returns:
        new descriptor

        Returns:

        public static FileDescriptor of(String repositoryId,
                                String fileId)
        Creates a FileDescriptor in the root folder of a specific repository.
        Parameters:
        repositoryId - in which the file should be stored
        fileId - identifier of the file
        Returns:
        the descriptor

        Creates a FileDescriptor for a specific folder in a repository.

        folderId - in the repository
        fileId - identifier of the file
        Returns:
        the descriptor
